hero.title: med spa located in meridian, idaho
hero.text: It is our mission to deliver beautiful and natural results while maintaining safety and professionalism.

services.title: our services
services.text: We specialize in non-invasive and non-surgical treatments including Botox and fillers.

about.title: meet the owner
about.head: rachel ryan
about.text: Hello! My name is Rachel Ryan and I am a Registered Nurse with my Masters in Administrative Nurse Leadership and masters degree as a Family Nurse Practitioner. I have been an Aesthetic Nurse since graduating Nursing school in 2015 and am very dedicated to continuing education and learning new and up-to-date techniques. My passion is helping men and women age gracefully while maintaining their natural aesthetic. I have an artistic eye for facial details and maintaining symmetry through non-invasive and non-surgical treatments including Botox and fillers.
about.quote: It is my mission to deliver beautiful and natural results while maintaining safety and professionalism.

testimonials.text: Rachel is absolutely wonderful, very professional, and knowledgeable. She takes the time to answer questions and address any concerns. Not to mention she does a great job!
testimonials.title: Alyssa C.

testimonials.text: Rachel is absolutely amazing! Hands down best service and results ever! My first experience with lips was done by someone else and my lips dissolved so fast and when I met Rachel she listened attentively and gave me EXACTLY what I wanted with amazing results!This woman is a goddess! I cannot wait to go back to her in a fewweeks for another syringe THANK YOU RACHEL!
testimonials.title: Tiffany B.

testimonials.text: Rachel was amazing. She made me feel at ease, was very personable and professional. Definitely will recommend her to anyone and everyone!!

data.text: A full syringe is 1/4 tsp product and will only increase your size by 10-15% and lasts 6-12 months. A half syringe will not increase size, but will help add hydration and definition to the lip and lasts 3-4 months. A half syringe is a great way to maintain lip size once your optimal size is achieved, every 4-6 months or so.

data.button: What is the difference between lip filler and lip flip?
data.text: A full syringe is 1/4 tsp product and will only increase your size by 10-15% and lasts 6-12 months. A half syringe will not increase size, but will help add hydration and definition to the lip and lasts 3-4 months. A half syringe is a great way to maintain lip size once your optimal size is achieved, every 4-6 months or so.

data.button: Can I do Botox or filler when pregnant?

A half syringe is a great way to maintain lip size once your optimal size is achieved, every 4-6 months or so.
